item.title: Spotify adds more livestream platforms to its virtual event listings
item.description: Spotify began showing virtual event listings last fall, but now it's expanding that info so you can easily keep up with livestreams.

item.title: Amazon's Fire TV Stick Lite is on sale for $20 for Prime members
item.description: Amazon knocks the price of the Fire TV Stick Lite streaming dongle down to $20 for Prime members.

item.title: Apple begins studying whether the Watch can predict COVID-19
item.description: Apple has launched a study that could determine if a Watch or iPhone can predict COVID-19 and other respiratory illnesses.

item.title: Plex's latest funding will boost its own streaming catalog while supporting others
item.description: Plex has raised $50 million in new funding as part of its bid to become a one-stop shop for all things streaming.

item.title: Amazon's redesigned Echo Buds offer improved noise cancellation for $120
item.description: Amazon's second-gen Echo Buds are cheaper, smaller and offer true active noise cancellation on top of hands-free access to Alexa.

item.title: Spotify's improved podcast charts now rank individual episodes
item.description: Spotify is giving users the chance to discover even relatively unknown podcasts by launching a "Top Episodes" ranking for its charts.

item.title: Vizio's rotating Elevate soundbar is $220 off at Wellbots
item.description: Vizio's high-end Elevate soundbar is 22 percent off at Wellbots.

item.title: Urbanista says its solar-powered headphones can basically play endlessly
item.description: The Urbanista Los Angeles ANC set can convert all light into power.

item.title: The Morning After: Both Apple and Samsung have launch events planned for April
item.description: Today’s headlines: Both Apple and Samsung announce launch events for April, the first major PS5 update will roll out starting today and Microsoft's new 'Modern' accessories include its first webcam in years.

item.title: DARPA picks Lockheed Martin and Blue Origin to build nuclear spacecraft
item.description: DARPA has picked Jeff Bezo's Blue Origin, Lockheed Martin and General Atomics to build and demonstrate a spacecraft driven by nuclear thermal propulsion.

item.title: 'Final Fantasy XIV' PS5 open beta upgrades both graphics and sound
item.description: Final Fantasy XIV is now available on the PS5 as an open beta, and Square Enix's Matt Hilton has detailed the enhancements for the new console on the PlayStation Blog.

item.title: Canon confirms a high-speed EOS R3 mirrorless camera is on the way
item.description: Canon has confirmed a rumor that it's developing the EOS R3, a "high-performance, high-speed" full-frame mirrorless camera designed for news and sports, along with three new lenses.

item.title: Sony’s new Xperia 1 III smartphone is a love letter to photography nerds
item.description: Last year’s Xperia 1 II might have been a mobile photographer’s dream come true, but it was far from perfect — it didn’t have 5G in the US, its design could feel awkward, and it focused on the camera experience over just about everything else. But in designing the new Xperia 1 III, Sony seems to have addressed, well, just about everything we didn’t like about the last one.

item.title: The FBI got a court order to delete backdoors from hacked Exchange servers
item.description: An FBI operation accessed Microsoft Exchange Servers remotely, causing hacker-installed web shells to delete themselves.

item.title: AT&T, T-Mobile and Verizon end their joint effort for RCS texting
item.description: AT&T, T-Mobile and Verizon have ended the Cross Carrier Messaging Initiative (CCMI), the joint venture they formed in 2019 to push RCS texting, according to Light Reading.

item.title: Oculus Quest 2 owners can start testing wireless PC VR gaming with Air Link
item.description: With the latest software update, Oculus Quest 2 owners can play PC VR games streamed via WiFi, no strings or wires needed.

item.title: Rode Connect app simplifies recording multi-host podcasts on one PC
item.description: Recording a podcast with multiple guests on one PC is surprisingly difficult. Rode Connect makes it ridiculously easy -- if you don't mind buying one of their microphones.

item.title: Ludwig Ahgren breaks the Twitch subscriber record with a 31-day live stream
item.description: Ludwig Ahgren's month-long "subathon" ends tonight after the streamer broke Twitch's all-time record for subscribers.

item.title: Samsung is hosting yet another Unpacked event on April 28th
item.description: The event will be livestreamed on April 28th, and the invite teases that "the most powerful Galaxy is coming."

item.title: 'Mass Effect Legendary Edition' comparison trailer shows off the upgrades
item.description: A 4K look at all the improvements coming to the Mass Effect trilogy next month.

item.title: Fortnite’s next crossover character is Aloy from ‘Horizon Zero Dawn’
item.description: Epic Games is teaming her up with Lara Croft for a limited-time event.

item.title: Apple TV+ docuseries will explore high-tech music production with Mark Ronson
item.description: 'Watch the Sound with Mark Ronson' premieres on July 30th on Apple TV+.

item.title: Discord blocks adult NSFW servers on its iOS app
item.description: Those communities are still available on Android and other platforms.

item.title: Epic announces billion-dollar funding round ahead of Apple trial
item.description: Sony has increased its stake in the company with a $200 million investment.

item.title: The Polestar 2 is getting a cheaper, single-motor option
item.description: The EV will have a longer range in cooler climates if you add a new heat pump.
